name: Authoriy
description:
In this game you take on the role of a hacker in the future and your job is to overthrow the evil government.

this description of the game makes it sound way more interesting than it is, the game has walls of text, no sound, and lasts about five minutes if you are slow. But it works, and I am probably not touching it again so it's "finished"

In the game you get a desktop that you can open, move and interact with files in, making that work was fun, but the game isn't. Honestly I am tempted to just classify it as a piece of code and not a game, but it is technically playable. Anyway you can play it just don't expect a game.

Written in python with pygame for graphics, all assets by me

also if you have a small screen, things might mess up so check if your screen has a bar at the bottom like the screenshot if not then it isn't working
